metadata.title: CVE-2021-23186 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A sandboxing issue in Odoo Community 15.0 and earlier and Odoo Enterprise15.0 and earlier allows authenticated administrators to access and modifydatabase contents of other tenants, in a multi-tenant system.

criterions.comment: odoo package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
